ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.VOLUME_SETTINGS_DOC: Configure volume behavior and startup options
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.VOLUME_MODE_DOC: Hardware mode (recommended) provides direct volume control and proper UI sync. Software mode uses Volumio's volume scripts but may have sync issues with I2S-only DACs.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.MAP_TO_100_DOC: If enabled, the Volume will range from 0 to 100. If disabled it will reflect the Allo Relay Attenuator range of 0 to 63.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.STARTUP_VOLUME_DOC: Volume level when plugin starts. Remember Last will restore previous volume.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.MUTE_ON_STARTUP_DOC: Start muted for safety with high-power amplifiers. Unmute manually after startup.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.IR_ENABLED_DOC: Enable IR remote control for volume and playback functions.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.IR_GPIO_PIN_DOC: GPIO pin for IR receiver. Default is GPIO17 when using Piano DAC (J7 Pin 8 = GPIOB15 = Pi GPIO17). Use GPIO5 only for direct Pi wiring without DAC.
ALLO_RELAY_ATTENUATOR.REBOOT_CANCELLED: Reboot cancelled. Please reboot manually for IR changes to take effect.
